attributes.action: Stop signing up to new EU structures
attributes.background: We constantly hear that leaving the EU is difficult because there are so many links to disentangle. Therefore it makes no sense that, even as UK negotiators work to do this, officials are signing up to even more EU structures, such as the new defence initiatives. This must stop. Brexit means Brexit.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
